cab.content: 182ent ^s ^g Property ofMajesty's Government,12SECRET.BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 15th JUNE, 1918.1, On the French front the situation remains unchanged.2. On the British front a successful local operation was carried out last night by us north of BETHUNE. Over 60 prisoners were captured.General Staff,War Office, S.I.I. 15th June, 1918,Issued at 12,35 p,m.
